Detailed Description

Text renderer for Arabic text.

Member Function Documentation

XYDIM ArabicTextRenderer::DrawText (  DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  clip_rect,
XYDIM  x,
XYDIM  y,
const WCHAR *  text,
INT  from,
INT  char_count
)  [virtual]
 

Text that is passed to DrawText must be bidi-fied, i.e. the BidiManager must already have processed the text.

For more information,

See also:
AbstractTextRenderer::DrawText.

Reimplemented from AbstractTextRenderer.

Size ArabicTextRenderer::GetGlyph (  const WCHAR *  cur_text_pos,
const WCHAR *  substitution_char,
INT  n_chars,
GlyphPtr  glyph,
INT &  parsed_glyphs,
BOOLEAN &  is_diacritic
)  [protected, virtual]
 

Rules for determining which character to choose (inital, medial, final, isolated) have been taken from http://acl.ldc.upenn.edu/W/W98/W98-1004.pdf

Implements AbstractTextRenderer.

const Font &  font,

Text that is passed to GetTextWidth must be bidi-fied, i.e. the BidiManager must already have processed the text.

For more information,

See also:
AbstractTextRenderer::GetTextWidth.

Reimplemented from AbstractTextRenderer.

INT ArabicTextRenderer::WrapLine (  const WCHAR *  text,
const Font &  font,
TextAttr  text_attr,
INT  char_count,
XYDIM  max_width = -1,
WrapPolicy  policy = (WrapPolicy) 0,
BOOLEAN  include_gap_at_end = FALSE,
Size *  total_size = 0,
INT *  ws_at_eol_count = 0,
XYDIM *  ws_at_eol_width = 0,
INT *  last_whitespace_index = 0
)  [virtual]
 

Text that is passed to WrapLine MUST NOT be bidi-fied, i.e. the text must be passed to WrapLine in its original order!

For more information,

See also:
AbstractTextRenderer::WrapLine.

Reimplemented from AbstractTextRenderer.
